scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore(npm): update npm version" && bower version patch -m "chore(release): Bump to %s" && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore(npm): update npm version" && bower version minor -m "chore(release): Bump to %s" && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore(npm): update npm version" && bower version major -m "chore(release): Bump to %s" && git push --tags
